title: AD increase-Nom IR increase-Bond price decrease

content.question: Assume that the economy is in equilibrium. If aggregate demand increases, nominal interest rates and bond prices will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label: Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Increase
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Decrease
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Not change
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Decrease Increase
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
